resources.string: Are you sure you wish to end your turn?

• Highest roll begins game
 • Clockwise direction
 • If no pieces are ingame and no 6 is rolled, you skip turn
 • To enter the game you need to roll a 6
 • You must always move a piece the amount shown bye dice
 • If a 6 is rolled you may move 6 or enter another piece, and roll again
 • Upon the third 6 rolled in a row, you forfeit your turn
 • You can not land on your own piece, ERGO NO STACKING
 • If you land on another player piece, you send the piece back to start
 
 Official rules from:
 www.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludo_(board_game)
You must choose a piece to move.
